official_title: A bill to extend for 5 years the existing temporary duty-free treatment of machines designed for heat-set, stretch texturing of continuous man-made fibers.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to extend, through December 31, 1990, the duty-free treatment on machines designed for heat-set, stretch texturing of continuous man-made fibers.

titles.title: A bill to extend for 5 years the existing temporary duty-free treatment of machines designed for heat-set, stretch texturing of continuous man-made fibers.
